text: The Balochistan Liberation Army (; also known as the Baloch Liberation Army, abbreviated BLA) is a militant group made up of Baloch nationalists. It is based in southern Afghanistan and often attacks areas in Pakistan's Balochistan province. The group wants Balochistan to break away from Pakistan. It attacks the Pakistani army, regular people, and foreigners. BLA's first recorded activity was in mid-2000, when it claimed credit for a series of bombings against Pakistani authorities."Balochistan Liberation Army â€“ Mapping Militant Organizations".
